## Read convocation coordinate file


```{r setup}

library(tidyverse)

path <- "/home/ajackson/Dropbox/Rprojects/TexasDioceseCreationCare/Data/"

```

##  Read the data

```{r read data in (and save it)}

foo <- rvest::read_html(paste0(path, "Convocations.dat"))

foo <- xml2::read_html(paste0(path, "Convocations.dat"))

foo <- sf::st_read(paste0(path, "The Episcopal Diocese of Texas.kml"))

```
